## 对b1进行 bc,ms等整体指标进行分析


### 必要的包
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide', echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstatix)
library(ggpubr)
library(lmerTest)
library(sjPlot)
library(parameters)
library(effectsize)
library(emmeans)
library(performance)
```


### 开始分析

#### fangfa
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mix_e_f <- function(dt, bname, sname, metri){

  dtc2 <- dt %>% filter(block_name%in%bname, stim%in%sname) %>%
    group_by(block_name, participant_phone, type, trial_name) %>%
    summarise(fc=mean(!!sym(metri), na.rm=T), maas=mean(maas), tgjl=mean(tgjl), sas=mean(sas)) %>%
    filter(!is.na(fc)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(block_name=case_when(block_name=="b1a"~"Ex",
                                block_name=="b1b"~"In")) %>%
    convert_as_factor(block_name, participant_phone, type, trial_name) %>%
    select(block_name, participant_phone, type, trial_name, tgjl, maas, sas, fc)
  
  
  # 极端值处理
  outdata <- dtc2 %>%
    group_by(trial_name) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r <- anti_join(dtc2, outdata)
  outdata2 <- dtb3_r %>%
    group_by(trial_name) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r2 <- anti_join(dtb3_r, outdata2)
  outdata3 <- dtb3_r2 %>%
    group_by(trial_name) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r3 <- anti_join(dtb3_r2, outdata3)
  outdata4 <- dtb3_r3 %>%
    group_by(trial_name) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r4 <- anti_join(dtb3_r3, outdata4)
  outdata5 <- dtb3_r4 %>%
    group_by(trial_name) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  
  
  # 模型拟合
  mixed_maas = lmer(fc ~ maas+block_name+type+maas*type+maas*block_name+maas*block_name*type + (1 | participant_phone)+ (1 | trial_name), data = dtb3_r4)
  mixed_sas = lmer(fc ~ sas+block_name+type+sas*type+sas*block_name+sas*block_name*type + (1 | participant_phone)+ (1 | trial_name), data = dtb3_r4)
  
  # maas 结果
  # 基本参数
  maas_t <- model_parameters(mixed_maas)
  maas_perfor <- model_performance(mixed_maas)
  maas_jh <- anova(mixed_maas)
  maas_eta <- eta_squared(mixed_maas)
  # 简单效应与配对检验
  maas_emm <- emmeans(mixed_maas, pairwise ~ maas | type*block_name , cov.reduce = function(x) quantile(x, c(0.1, 0.3, 0.5, 0.7,0.9)))
  maas_se1 <- joint_tests(mixed_maas , by=c("type"))
  maas_se1.5 <- joint_tests(mixed_maas , by=c("block_name"))
  
  # 模型固定因子效应量
  maas_p1 <- plot_model(mixed_maas, show.values = TRUE, value.offset = .3, title = metri)
  # 模型交互1
  maas_p2 <- plot_model(mixed_maas, type = "pred", terms = c("maas","type","block_name"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 模型交互2
  maas_p3 <- plot_model(mixed_maas, type = "pred", terms = c("maas","block_name", "type"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 结果汇总
  maas_results <- list(maas_t=maas_t, maas_perfor=maas_perfor, maas_jh=maas_jh, maas_eta=maas_eta,  maas_emm=maas_emm,  maas_se1=maas_se1,  maas_se1.5=maas_se1.5,  p1=maas_p1, p2=maas_p2, p3=maas_p3)
  
  # sas 结果
  # 基本参数
  sas_t <- model_parameters(mixed_sas)
  sas_perfor <- model_performance(mixed_sas)
  sas_jh <- anova(mixed_sas)
  sas_eta <- eta_squared(mixed_sas)
  # 简单效应与配对检验
  sas_emm <- emmeans(mixed_sas, pairwise ~ sas | type*block_name , cov.reduce = function(x) quantile(x, c(0.1, 0.3, 0.5, 0.7,0.9)))
  sas_se1 <- joint_tests(mixed_sas , by=c("type"))
  sas_se1.5 <- joint_tests(mixed_sas , by=c("block_name"))
  
  # 模型固定因子效应量
  sas_p1 <- plot_model(mixed_sas, show.values = TRUE, value.offset = .3, title = metri)
  # 模型交互1
  sas_p2 <- plot_model(mixed_sas, type = "pred", terms = c("sas","type","block_name"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 模型交互2
  sas_p3 <- plot_model(mixed_sas, type = "pred", terms = c("sas","block_name", "type"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 结果汇总
  sas_results <- list(sas_t=sas_t, sas_perfor=sas_perfor, sas_jh=sas_jh, sas_eta=sas_eta,  sas_emm=sas_emm,  sas_se1=sas_se1,  sas_se1.5=sas_se1.5,  p1=sas_p1, p2=sas_p2, p3=sas_p3)
  
  
  f <- list(maas_results, sas_results)
}

```

#### 参数定义
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
bname <- c("b1a","b1b")
sname <- c(1,1.5)

mlist <- c("bc", "bd",  "msc", "mspv")



dt <- read_csv("/Users/placenameday/R study/edf_demo/data/processed/eye_tacking/ea/data/inner_dt_stim_re_2.csv")
```

## 分析
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
map(mlist,  possibly(mix_e_f, otherwise = NA_character_), dt=dt, bname=bname, sname=sname)
```
